Salt_Lake_City.Simon Bamberger House: The Simon Bamberger Home, also known as Gardner Manor, is a house in Salt Lake City, Utah, United States, that was built in the 1880s. Its architectural style has been described as a transitional "Pre-Victorian, neo-Greek Revival" type, having obvious characteristics of grandeur and power. It has pilasters, window bays, and a classical Greek entablature.
